attributes.action: Remove the ‘Partygate’ MP’s including the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Conservative MP’s that failed to adhere to their own Covid 19 legislation have taken hypocrisy to a whole new level. Those that looked shocked to hear the scandals, then confirmed they weren’t there to then be outed by the ‘Partygate’ investigation should be totally ashamed of their actions and should not hold a position of power.  There is a greed, arrogance and complete lack of integrity in these MP’s, qualities of which I’m sure you, the British public, didn’t vote for.
attributes.background: Remove all MP’s that have been fined for attending ‘illegal’ social gatherings during the Covid 19 pandemic. Remove all those that failed to adhere to their own party’s legislation to which the British public observed.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
